For installing DLC you need to follow these steps:

1. Make sure the game folder is titled Mass Effect.

2. Move it to your Program Files (C:\Program Files)

3. Install the DLC.  The game is fully up-to-date.

4. Goto the back-ups folder copy the crack and paste it in the binaries folder.

DLC INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

About my pass instructions.  They were wrong. lol My bad.  You must FIRST install the reg file located in the Mass Effect folder. (Registry.reg). Then copy or move the Mass Effect folder to either C:\Program Files\Mass Effect for 86 Bit computers or C:\Program Files (x86)\Mass Effect for 64 Bit computers.  Then you MUST goto the Back-Ups folder and copy the ORIGINAL MassEffect.exe over the crack in the Bineries folder.  After doing so you are now ready to install DLC.

Thanks for the upload. Fast download speed, no installing, just unrar and play and the fact it was already patched.
As for the game itself, i have to say, it was horrible. It could have been a great game, but it had so many flaws. The fact you cannot skip the cut-scenes (wich there are alot of). Altough you can modify a config file to allow you to skip them, you risk having a crash if you skip the wrong one. The Overheating glitch, wich can make the game unplayable. The fact you spend more time in elevators/other means of transportation than in acutal fights. And a dozen other minor glitches.
Sorry for going on a rant, i usually never comments on things, but i just felt that i had to.
And once again this is not directed at the uploader in any way, you did a great job.

hey, im having a problem, it says "The procedure entry point _BinkSetVolume@12 could not be located" any way to get around that?

Upload a screen shot for me man.  Also, run it in Compatibility mode for Windows XP Service Pack 3 and as Admin.   That is required for most Windows 7 and some Vista computers.

According to Google the reason you get that SPECIFIC erro is because the game is cracked. lol  Easy fix though.  Place the original MassEffect.exe over the cracked one, and then Repatch it then reapply the crack OR you could just recrack it and see if that works.

Theres three different things you could try.  Most likly while downloading someone seeded you bad info and the crack was messed up.

http://pcsupport.about.com/od/findbyerrormessage/a/binkw32dll.htm  You can read about it there.  It will tell you about the Bink32.dll which many times causes errors with all games.  Many people have issues with bink so believe me, its not just you or the game release.  You can download the RAD Game tools for free, just search google for it.  They give the Bink tools out for free so no need to pirate them.  That could also fix the problem.

hi TyMod. thanks for uploading this game. i have played it before and i really loved it. however there is a slight problem i am encountering. i would really appreciate if you could help me out here. my system's configuration is Windows Vista Business Edition(32 bit), 3 GB RAM, T6400 @ 2.00 Ghz 2.00 Ghz

i currently have ME2 installed on my system and it runs perfectly fine.

ME1 calls for the game to be ran in compatibility mode for Windows XP on Vista and 7.  That should fix the issues.

You get a black screen becaus it is creating the game folder in My Documents.  LEave it alone (it can take anywhere from 3 to 5 mins to load).  It's not the fact its not responding, its just loading the game folders.  Thats a ported game for you.  Also if you keep clicking on the window and it does freeze it will not load or it will take longer, so leave it alone.

Hope this helps everyone.

hey TyMod! im a complete noob at this stuff so...you said use the crack from the backup folder... how do you use the crack?

Don't.  Just unpack the game and play.  The backup crack is only to be used if the game is asking for a key.

If it ask for a key though first try to play it offline.
If it still ask for a key while offline than apply crack.

Otherwise, just extract the game and play. :)
